Description.Text:
Property Location
You'll be centrally located in Nice with a stay at Hotel Le Lausanne, minutes from Orthodox Cathedral and Nice Etoile Shopping Center. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Basilique Notre Dame and Casino Ruhl.

Rooms
Stay in one of 35 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request irons/ironing boards.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and express check-in. Planning an event in Nice? This hotel has facilities measuring 484 square feet (45 square meters), including a meeting room. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-out time is 11:30 AM
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Orthodox Cathedral - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Basilique Notre Dame - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Nice Etoile Shopping Center - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Casino Ruhl - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Albert 1st Gardens - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Promenade des Anglais - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Verdure Theatre - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Nice Museum of Fine Arts - 1 km / 0.7 mi
Place Massena - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Quai des Etats Unis - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Nice Opera - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
St. Roch Hospital - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Courthouse Square - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Marc Chagall National Museum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Cours Saleya - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi

The nearest airports are:
Nice (NCE-Cote d'Azur) - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
Monte Carlo (MCM-Monaco Heliport) - 13.1 km / 8.2 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Le Lausanne is Nice (NCE-Cote d'Azur).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
